summary: This modd adds new Dwarven katana
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Old Dwarven Katana[/color] for Skyrim v1.0 Eng/Rus

[color=#ffff00]Author[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures

***

This mod adds new Dwarven katana and daito. Then can be obtained in the Deep Folk Crossing location.

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY ONE ESP-FILE!!![/color]
